bug.question: I'm a bug that crawls on the ground and have six legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to be outside.
🐜 I'm very small!
🪨 I can live under a rock.

bug.question: I can fly, have bright wings, and love to land on flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I love sweet nectar.
🦋 I start as a caterpillar.
🌈 My wings have pretty colors.

bug.question: I buzz, make honey, and live in colonies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I live in a hive.
🐝 I can sting you.
🌼 I fly around to collect pollen.

bug.question: I hop around and chirp, and I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat grass.
🦗 I can jump very high.
🎵 You hear me in the summer.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 Flies are my favorite snack.

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night, and have the ability to fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have a light on my tummy.
🔦 I fly around when it's dark.
🌃 You can see me during summer nights.

bug.question: I eat wood and live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I build nests underground or inside of wood.
🏠 I live with many other bugs.
🐜 I am not an ant, but I look similar.

bug.question: I'm a small insect that sucks blood. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be very itchy!
💉 I fly around and bite.
🌃 I like to come out at dawn and dusk.

bug.question: I have spots and bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am red, yellow, or orange.
🌱 Gardeners like me because I get rid of plant eaters.
⚫ I have spots on my back.

bug.question: I munch on plants as a larva, but turn into something beautiful that flies as an adult. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I become a butterfly.
🍃 I eat leaves.
🦋 I transform inside a chrysalis.

plant.question: I am green and grow on trees. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am yellow when I am ripe
🐒 Monkeys love to peel and eat me
🌳 I grow in bunches

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a vine. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am the color of fire trucks
🥗 I'm yummy in a salad
🪴 I grow in a garden on a plant

plant.question: I am tall and brown and have leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 My leaves change color in the fall
🪵 I am made of wood
🦉 Owls live in me

plant.question: I am orange and crunchy and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am the same color as a pumpkin
🐰 Bunnies enjoy eating me
🌱 I have a green leafy top

plant.question: I have pretty petals and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in lots of colors
🐝 Bees make honey from me
💐 People give me as gifts

plant.question: I am long and green and grow in a pod. You can find many of me inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of Kermit the Frog
🥣 I can be eaten in soup
🌱 I grow on a vine

plant.question: I am yellow and grow on a stalk. Animals like to eat me at the farm. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I pop when heated up
👩‍🌾 Farmers grow me in fields
🚜 I am harvested in the fall

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful flowers. Be careful when you pick me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me to people they love
🌵 I can poke you
❤️ I can be red, white, pink or yellow

plant.question: I am a big green plant that grows in the sea. Fish like to hide in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm under the sea
🐠 Nemo can hide in me
🌱 I am green and sway in the water

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall plant. You can grind me to make flour. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 You can make bread from me
☀️ I grow best in sunny fields
🥣 I am used to make cereal
